Text: 1. In Hexoban, your goal is to push all the magical purple runes onto their green counterpart.
2. Use your arcane powers to move your character with the arrow keys on your enchanted spellbook.
3. Beware! Once a rune is pushed, it cannot be pulled back. Plan your moves carefully.
4. Press 'Z' to undo your last move if you need to rethink your strategy.
5. Approach the yellow NPCs, solve their riddles, and you can save your progress in your spellbook.
6. If you ever get stuck, press 'R' to restart the whole game.
7. When you wish to return to the main menu, press 'M'.
8. May the magical spirits guide you. Press '0' to return to the main menu and begin your journey!
